body_html:
I think this might have something to do with the C_API vs. non C_API stuff. Shape inference tends to be better with the new C API.

Try setting environment variable TF_C_API_GRAPH_CONSTRUCTION_SHAPES and TF_C_API_GRAPH_CONSTRUCTION to 1 and then see.
body_text:
I think this might have something to do with the C_API vs. non C_API stuff. Shape inference tends to be better with the new C API.
Try setting environment variable TF_C_API_GRAPH_CONSTRUCTION_SHAPES and TF_C_API_GRAPH_CONSTRUCTION to 1 and then see.
body:
I think this might have something to do with the C_API vs. non C_API stuff. Shape inference tends to be better with the new C API.

Try setting environment variable TF_C_API_GRAPH_CONSTRUCTION_SHAPES and TF_C_API_GRAPH_CONSTRUCTION to 1 and then see.
